price: Sunã tambayar ka* ga Sã'a. Ka ce: "Saninta yanã wurin Allah kawai." Kuma me yã sanar da kai cẽwa anã tsammãnin sa'a ta kasance kusa?
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُكَ ٱلنَّاسُ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا
footnotes: * Shiryarwa ce ga Musulmi cewa idan zã su yi tambaya su tambayi addininsu da abũbuwa mãsu amfãni a gare su, kada su tambayi abinda ya fi hankalinsu kamar sa'a da abũbuwan gaibi da Allah Yã keɓãnta da saninsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yasaluka al-nāsu ʿani al-sāʿati qul innamā ʿil'muhā ʿinda al-lahi wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata takūnu qarīban
